german.description: Multilingual BART (mBART) model finetuned for cross-lingual summarization of scientific research papers of the computer science domain using the cross-lingual SciTLDR-X dataset. This german version is finetuned on human annotated data.

italian.description: Multilingual BART (mBART) model finetuned for cross-lingual summarization of scientific research papers of the computer science domain using the cross-lingual SciTLDR-X dataset. This italian version is finetuned on human annotated data.

french.description: Multilingual BART (mBART) model finetuned for cross-lingual summarization of scientific research papers of the computer science domain using the cross-lingual SciTLDR-X dataset. This french version is finetuned on machine translated data.

spanish.description: Multilingual BART (mBART) model finetuned for cross-lingual summarization of scientific research papers of the computer science domain using the cross-lingual SciTLDR-X dataset. This spanish version is finetuned on machine translated data.

russian.description: Multilingual BART (mBART) model finetuned for cross-lingual summarization of scientific research papers of the computer science domain using the cross-lingual SciTLDR-X dataset. This russian version is finetuned on machine translated data.
